urls.description: We have an amazing and vitally important network of beautiful rivers and waterways in the Colne Valley, and the Park‚Äôs River Rangers play a crucial role in keeping them in good condition. Our project manager for rivers, Chloe Crompton describes the Rangers as the heroes of our waterways: their work includes carrying out essential riverfly surveys to help us monitor the health of the rivers, and they are often the first to spot and report any signs of pollution.

urls.title: Environment Agency drops pollution incident reporting
urls.description: The Environment Agency (EA) has changed the way it reports its corporate performance, dropping a goal of reducing pollution incidents while introducing climate adaptation and air quality targets.

@srhodes81 @cumbriawildlife @unitedutilities @EnvAgencyNW All feedback welcome! We believe there‚Äôs no silver bullet for flood mitigation.
